verses.verse: עַל־ <WH5921> when מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֣י <WH4931> upon my watch אֶעֱמֹ֔דָה <WH5975> I will stand וְאֶֽתְיַצְּבָ֖ה <WH3320> and set עַל־ <WH5921> when מָצ֑וֹר <WH4692> me upon the tower וַאֲצַפֶּ֗ה <WH6822> and will watch לִרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> to see מַה־ <WH4100> what יְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> what he will say בִּ֔י וּמָ֥ה <WH4100> and how אָשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> unto me and what I shall answer עַל־ <WH5921> when תּוֹכַחְתִּֽי׃ <WH8433> when I am reproved

וַיַּעֲנֵ֤נִי <WH6030> answered יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> me and said כְּת֣וֹב <WH3789> Write חָז֔וֹן <WH2377> the vision וּבָאֵ֖ר <WH874> and make [it] plain עַל־ <WH5921> on הַלֻּח֑וֹת <WH3871> upon tables לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of יָר֖וּץ <WH7323> that he may run ק֥וֹרֵא <WH7121> that readeth בֽוֹ׃

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ע֤וֹד <WH5750> is yet חָזוֹן֙ <WH2377> For the vision לַמּוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> [is] yet for an appointed time וְיָפֵ֥חַ <WH6315> it shall speak לַקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> but at the end וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and it will not יְכַזֵּ֑ב <WH3576> and not lie אִם־ <WH518> Though יִתְמַהְמָהּ֙ <WH4102> though it tarry חַכֵּה־ <WH2442> wait ל֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בֹ֥א <WH935> for it because it will surely יָבֹ֖א <WH935> come לֹ֥א <WH3808> it will not יְאַחֵֽר׃ <WH309> it will not tarry

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold עֻפְּלָ֔ה <WH6075> [which] is lifted up לֹא־ <WH3808> is not יָשְׁרָ֥ה <WH3474> is not upright נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> Behold his soul בּ֑וֹ וְצַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> in him but the just בֶּאֱמוּנָת֥וֹ <WH530> by his faith יִחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> shall live

וְאַף֙ <WH637> Furthermore כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הַיַּ֣יִן <WH3196> by wine בּוֹגֵ֔ד <WH898> Yea also because he transgresseth גֶּ֥בֶר <WH1397> man יָהִ֖יר <WH3093> [he is] a proud וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> never יִנְוֶ֑ה <WH5115> neither keepeth at home אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> he הִרְחִ֨יב <WH7337> who enlargeth כִּשְׁא֜וֹל <WH7585> as hell נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> his desire וְה֤וּא <WH1931> he כַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> and [is] as death וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> never יִשְׂבָּ֔ע <WH7646> and cannot be satisfied וַיֶּאֱסֹ֤ף <WH622> but gathereth אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to himself כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> unto him all nations וַיִּקְבֹּ֥ץ <WH6908> and heapeth אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to himself כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> unto him all people

הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> of these כֻלָּ֗ם <WH3605> all עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> against מָשָׁ֣ל <WH4912> a parable יִשָּׂ֔אוּ <WH5375> Shall not all these take up וּמְלִיצָ֖ה <WH4426> against him and a taunting חִיד֣וֹת <WH2420> proverb ל֑וֹ וְיֹאמַ֗ר <WH559> against him and say ה֚וֹי <WH1945> Woe הַמַּרְבֶּ֣ה <WH7235> to him that increaseth לֹּא־ <WH3808> not ל֔וֹ עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֕י <WH4970> long וּמַכְבִּ֥יד <WH3513> [that which is] not his how long? and to him that ladeth עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> against עַבְטִֽיט׃ <WH5671> himself with thick clay

הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not פֶ֗תַע <WH6621> suddenly יָק֙וּמוּ֙ <WH6965> Shall they not rise up נֹשְׁכֶ֔יךָ <WH5391> that shall bite וְיִקְצ֖וּ <WH6974> arise מְזַעְזְעֶ֑יךָ <WH2111> that shall vex וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> become לִמְשִׁסּ֖וֹת <WH4933> thee and thou shalt be for booties לָֽמוֹ׃

כִּֽי <WH3588> Because אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you שַׁלּ֙וֹתָ֙ <WH7997> Because thou hast spoiled גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> many יְשָׁלּ֖וּךָ <WH7997> shall spoil כָּל־ <WH3605> All יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> all the remnant עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> of the people מִדְּמֵ֤י <WH1818> blood אָדָם֙ <WH120> thee because of men's וַחֲמַס־ <WH2555> and [for] the violence אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land קִרְיָ֖ה <WH7151> of the city וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and of all that dwell בָֽהּ׃ פ

ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Woe בֹּצֵ֛עַ <WH1214> to him that coveteth בֶּ֥צַע <WH1215> covetousness רָ֖ע <WH7451> an evil לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> to his house לָשׂ֤וּם <WH7760> that he may set בַּמָּרוֹם֙ <WH4791> on high קִנּ֔וֹ <WH7064> his nest לְהִנָּצֵ֖ל <WH5337> that he may be delivered מִכַּף־ <WH3709> from the power רָֽע׃ <WH7451> of evil

יָעַ֥צְתָּ <WH3289> Thou hast consulted בֹּ֖שֶׁת <WH1322> shame לְבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> to thy house קְצוֹת־ <WH7096> by cutting off עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> many וְחוֹטֵ֥א <WH2398> and hast sinned נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> [against] thy soul

כִּי־ <WH3588> Surely אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> For the stone מִקִּ֣יר <WH7023> of the wall תִּזְעָ֑ק <WH2199> shall cry out וְכָפִ֖יס <WH3714> and the beam out מֵעֵ֥ץ <WH6086> of the timber יַעֲנֶֽנָּה׃ <WH6030> shall answer פ

ה֛וֹי <WH1945> Woe בֹּנֶ֥ה <WH1129> to him that buildeth עִ֖יר <WH5892> a town בְּדָמִ֑ים <WH1818> with blood וְכוֹנֵ֥ן <WH3559> and stablisheth קִרְיָ֖ה <WH7151> a city בְּעַוְלָֽה׃ <WH5766> by iniquity

הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not הִנֵּ֔ה <WH2009> indeed מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Behold [is it] not of the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְיִֽיגְע֤וּ <WH3021> shall labour עַמִּים֙ <WH5971> that the people בְּדֵי־ <WH1767> in the very אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> fire וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <WH3816> and the people בְּדֵי־ <WH1767> themselves for very רִ֥יק <WH7385> empty יִעָֽפוּ׃ <WH3286> shall weary

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for תִּמָּלֵ֣א <WH4390> shall be filled הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> For the earth לָדַ֖עַת <WH3045> with the knowledge אֶת־ <WH853> כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> of the glory יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> as the waters יְכַסּ֥וּ <WH3680> cover עַל־ <WH5921> and יָֽם׃ <WH3220> the sea ס

ה֚וֹי <WH1945> Woe מַשְׁקֵ֣ה <WH8248> drink רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> unto him that giveth his neighbour מְסַפֵּ֥חַ <WH5596> that puttest חֲמָתְךָ֖ <WH2573> thy bottle וְאַ֣ף <WH637> even שַׁכֵּ֑ר <WH7937> to [him] and makest [him] drunken לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> So הַבִּ֖יט <WH5027> also that thou mayest look עַל־ <WH5921> on מְעוֹרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4589> on their nakedness

שָׂבַ֤עְתָּ <WH7646> Thou art filled קָלוֹן֙ <WH7036> with shame מִכָּב֔וֹד <WH3519> for glory שְׁתֵ֥ה <WH8354> drink גַם־ <WH1571> Now אַ֖תָּה <WH859> yourself וְהֵֽעָרֵ֑ל <WH6188> thou also and let thy foreskin be uncovered תִּסּ֣וֹב <WH5437> shall be turned עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> and כּ֚וֹס <WH3563> the cup יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> right hand יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S וְקִיקָל֖וֹן <WH7022> unto thee and shameful spewing עַל־ <WH5921> upon כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> [shall be] on thy glory

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For חֲמַ֤ס <WH2555> For the violence לְבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> of Lebanon יְכַסֶּ֔ךָּ <WH3680> shall cover וְשֹׁ֥ד <WH7701> thee and the spoil בְּהֵמ֖וֹת <WH929> of beasts יְחִיתַ֑ן <WH2865> [which] made them afraid מִדְּמֵ֤י <WH1818> blood אָדָם֙ <WH120> because of men's וַחֲמַס־ <WH2555> and for the violence אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land קִרְיָ֖ה <WH7151> of the city וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and of all that dwell בָֽהּ׃ ס

מָֽה־ <WH4100> What הוֹעִ֣יל <WH3276> What profiteth פֶּ֗סֶל <WH6459> the graven image כִּ֤י <WH3588> when פְסָלוֹ֙ <WH6458> thereof hath graven יֹֽצְר֔וֹ <WH3336> of his work מַסֵּכָ֖ה <WH4541> it the molten image וּמ֣וֹרֶה <WH3384> and a teacher שָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> of lies כִּ֣י <WH3588> when בָטַ֞ח <WH982> trusteth יֹצֵ֤ר <WH3335> that the maker יִצְרוֹ֙ <WH3335> that the maker עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> therein to make אֱלִילִ֥ים <WH457> idols אִלְּמִֽים׃ <WH483> dumb ס

ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Woe אֹמֵ֤ר <WH559> unto him that saith לָעֵץ֙ <WH6086> to the wood הָקִ֔יצָה <WH6974> Awake ע֖וּרִי <WH5782> Arise לְאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone דּוּמָ֑ם <WH1748> to the dumb ה֣וּא <WH1931> it יוֹרֶ֔ה <WH3384> it shall teach הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold ה֗וּא <WH1931> it תָּפוּשׂ֙ <WH8610> Behold it [is] laid זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> over with gold וָכֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> and silver וְכָל־ <WH3605> all ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> and [there is] no breath אֵ֥ין <WH369> and there בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> at all in the midst

וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> But the LORD בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> temple קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> [is] in his holy הַ֥ס <WH2013> keep silence מִפָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> before כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> let all the earth פ
